trans-unit.source: Getting Detailed Help Information
trans-unit.target: Getting Detailed Help Information

trans-unit.source: powershell,cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell,cmdlet

trans-unit.source: Getting Detailed Help Information
trans-unit.target: Getting Detailed Help Information

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell includes detailed Help topics that explain Windows PowerShell concepts and the Windows PowerShell language.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell includes detailed Help topics that explain Windows PowerShell concepts and the Windows PowerShell language.

trans-unit.source: There are also Help topics for each cmdlet and provider and Help topics for many functions and scripts.
trans-unit.target: There are also Help topics for each cmdlet and provider and Help topics for many functions and scripts.

trans-unit.source: You can display these Help topics at the command prompt or view the most recently updated versions of these topics in the Microsoft TechNet Library.
trans-unit.target: You can display these Help topics at the command prompt or view the most recently updated versions of these topics in the Microsoft TechNet Library.

trans-unit.source: Many programs that host Windows PowerShell, such as Windows PowerShell Integrated Scripting Environment, provide additional Help features, such as context-sensitive Help and compiled Help file (.chm).
trans-unit.target: Many programs that host Windows PowerShell, such as Windows PowerShell Integrated Scripting Environment, provide additional Help features, such as context-sensitive Help and compiled Help file (.chm).

trans-unit.source: Getting Help for Cmdlets
trans-unit.target: Getting Help for Cmdlets

trans-unit.source: To get Help about Windows PowerShell cmdlets, use the [Get-Help [m2]](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/2d7fe1b4-0025-4580-a911-d81922dd6cd2) cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: To get Help about Windows PowerShell cmdlets, use the [Get-Help [m2]](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/2d7fe1b4-0025-4580-a911-d81922dd6cd2) cmdlet.

trans-unit.source: For example, to get Help for the [Get-ChildItem [m2]](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/4b270d63-c995-45b8-b5b4-3f8887efbfcc) cmdlet, type:
trans-unit.target: For example, to get Help for the [Get-ChildItem [m2]](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/4b270d63-c995-45b8-b5b4-3f8887efbfcc) cmdlet, type:

trans-unit.source: or
trans-unit.target: or

trans-unit.source: You can even get Help about the Get-Help cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: You can even get Help about the Get-Help cmdlet.

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: For example:

trans-unit.source: To get a list of all the cmdlet Help topics in your session, type:
trans-unit.target: To get a list of all the cmdlet Help topics in your session, type:

trans-unit.source: To display one page of each Help topic at a time, use the **help** function or its alias **man**.
trans-unit.target: To display one page of each Help topic at a time, use the **help** function or its alias **man**.

trans-unit.source: For example, to display Help for the Get-ChildItem cmdlet, type
trans-unit.target: For example, to display Help for the Get-ChildItem cmdlet, type

trans-unit.source: or
trans-unit.target: or

trans-unit.source: To display detailed information about a cmdlet, function, or script, including descriptions of its parameters and examples of its use, use the *Detailed* parameter of the Get-Help cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: To display detailed information about a cmdlet, function, or script, including descriptions of its parameters and examples of its use, use the *Detailed* parameter of the Get-Help cmdlet.

trans-unit.source: For example, to get detailed information about the Get-ChildItem cmdlet, type:
trans-unit.target: For example, to get detailed information about the Get-ChildItem cmdlet, type:

trans-unit.source: To display all content in the Help topic, use the *Full* parameter of the Get-Help cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: To display all content in the Help topic, use the *Full* parameter of the Get-Help cmdlet.

trans-unit.source: For example, to display all content in the Help topic for the Get-ChildItem cmdlet, type:
trans-unit.target: For example, to display all content in the Help topic for the Get-ChildItem cmdlet, type:

trans-unit.source: To get detailed Help about the parameters of a cmdlet, use the *Parameter* parameter of the Get-Help cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: To get detailed Help about the parameters of a cmdlet, use the *Parameter* parameter of the Get-Help cmdlet.

trans-unit.source: For example, to get detailed Help for all of the parameters of the Get-ChildItem cmdlet, type:
trans-unit.target: For example, to get detailed Help for all of the parameters of the Get-ChildItem cmdlet, type:

trans-unit.source: To display only the examples in a Help topic, use the *Example* parameter of the Get-Help.
trans-unit.target: To display only the examples in a Help topic, use the *Example* parameter of the Get-Help.

trans-unit.source: For example, to display only the examples in the Help topic for the Get-ChildItem cmdlet, type:
trans-unit.target: For example, to display only the examples in the Help topic for the Get-ChildItem cmdlet, type:

trans-unit.source: For information about how to write Help topics for the cmdlets that you write, see the "How to Write Cmdlet Help" topic in MSDN.
trans-unit.target: For information about how to write Help topics for the cmdlets that you write, see the "How to Write Cmdlet Help" topic in MSDN.

trans-unit.source: Getting Conceptual Help
trans-unit.target: Getting Conceptual Help

trans-unit.source: The Get-Help cmdlet also displays information about conceptual topics in Windows PowerShell, including topics about the Windows PowerShell language.
trans-unit.target: The Get-Help cmdlet also displays information about conceptual topics in Windows PowerShell, including topics about the Windows PowerShell language.

trans-unit.source: Conceptual Help topics begin with the "about_" prefix, such as about_line_editing.
trans-unit.target: Conceptual Help topics begin with the "about_" prefix, such as about_line_editing.

trans-unit.source: (The name of the conceptual topic must be entered in English even on non-English versions of Windows PowerShell.)
trans-unit.target: (The name of the conceptual topic must be entered in English even on non-English versions of Windows PowerShell.)

trans-unit.source: To display a list of conceptual topics, type:
trans-unit.target: To display a list of conceptual topics, type:

trans-unit.source: To display a particular Help topic, type the topic name, for example:
trans-unit.target: To display a particular Help topic, type the topic name, for example:

trans-unit.source: The parameters of Get-Help, such as *Detailed*, *Parameter*, and *Examples*, have no effect on the display of conceptual Help topics.
trans-unit.target: The parameters of Get-Help, such as *Detailed*, *Parameter*, and *Examples*, have no effect on the display of conceptual Help topics.

trans-unit.source: Getting Help About Providers
trans-unit.target: Getting Help About Providers

trans-unit.source: The Get-Help cmdlet displays information about Windows PowerShell providers.
trans-unit.target: The Get-Help cmdlet displays information about Windows PowerShell providers.

trans-unit.source: To get Help for a provider, type "Get-Help" followed by the provider name.
trans-unit.target: To get Help for a provider, type "Get-Help" followed by the provider name.

trans-unit.source: For example, to get Help for the Registry provider, type:
trans-unit.target: For example, to get Help for the Registry provider, type:

trans-unit.source: To get a list of all the provider Help topics in your session, type
trans-unit.target: To get a list of all the provider Help topics in your session, type

trans-unit.source: The parameters of Get-Help, such as *Detailed*, *Parameter*, and *Examples*, have no effect on the display of provider Help topics.
trans-unit.target: The parameters of Get-Help, such as *Detailed*, *Parameter*, and *Examples*, have no effect on the display of provider Help topics.

trans-unit.source: Getting Help About Scripts and Functions
trans-unit.target: Getting Help About Scripts and Functions

trans-unit.source: Many scripts and functions in Windows PowerShell have Help topics.
trans-unit.target: Many scripts and functions in Windows PowerShell have Help topics.

trans-unit.source: Use the Get-Help cmdlet to display the Help topics for scripts and functions.
trans-unit.target: Use the Get-Help cmdlet to display the Help topics for scripts and functions.

trans-unit.source: To display the Help for a function, type "get-help" followed by the function name.
trans-unit.target: To display the Help for a function, type "get-help" followed by the function name.

trans-unit.source: For example, to get Help for the Disable-PSRemoting function, type:
trans-unit.target: For example, to get Help for the Disable-PSRemoting function, type:

trans-unit.source: To display the Help for a script, type the fully qualified path to the script file.
trans-unit.target: To display the Help for a script, type the fully qualified path to the script file.

trans-unit.source: If the script is in a path that is listed in the Path environment variable, you can omit the path from the command.
trans-unit.target: If the script is in a path that is listed in the Path environment variable, you can omit the path from the command.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a script called "TestScript.ps1" in your C:\\PS-Test directory, to display the Help topic for the script, type:
trans-unit.target: For example, if you have a script called "TestScript.ps1" in your C:\\PS-Test directory, to display the Help topic for the script, type:

trans-unit.source: The parameters that were designed for displaying cmdlet Help, such as *Detailed*, *Full*, *Examples*, and *Parameter*, work for script Help and function Help, too.
trans-unit.target: The parameters that were designed for displaying cmdlet Help, such as *Detailed*, *Full*, *Examples*, and *Parameter*, work for script Help and function Help, too.

trans-unit.source: However, when you display all Help, by typing "get-help \*", Help for functions and scripts does not appear.
trans-unit.target: However, when you display all Help, by typing "get-help \*", Help for functions and scripts does not appear.

trans-unit.source: For information about writing Help topics for your functions and scripts, see [about_Functions [m2]](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/61d40692-5300-4de9-a9b5-bae31815e105), [about_Scripts](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/7dc08334-dcfe-450b-b949-0554855623af), and [about_Comment_Based_Help](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/99a81ccc-21a0-49ec-a1b3-9efe2b4c0bbf).
trans-unit.target: For information about writing Help topics for your functions and scripts, see [about_Functions [m2]](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/61d40692-5300-4de9-a9b5-bae31815e105), [about_Scripts](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/7dc08334-dcfe-450b-b949-0554855623af), and [about_Comment_Based_Help](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/99a81ccc-21a0-49ec-a1b3-9efe2b4c0bbf).

trans-unit.source: Getting Help Online
trans-unit.target: Getting Help Online

trans-unit.source: If you are connected to the Internet, one of the best ways to get Help is to view the Help topics online.
trans-unit.target: If you are connected to the Internet, one of the best ways to get Help is to view the Help topics online.

trans-unit.source: Because online topics are easy to update, they are likely to provide the most current content.
trans-unit.target: Because online topics are easy to update, they are likely to provide the most current content.

trans-unit.source: To get Help online, try the *Online* parameter of the Get-Help cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: To get Help online, try the *Online* parameter of the Get-Help cmdlet.

trans-unit.source: The *Online* parameter of the Get-Help cmdlet works only for cmdlet Help, function Help, and script Help.
trans-unit.target: The *Online* parameter of the Get-Help cmdlet works only for cmdlet Help, function Help, and script Help.

trans-unit.source: You cannot use the *Online* parameter with conceptual (About) topics or provider Help topics.
trans-unit.target: You cannot use the *Online* parameter with conceptual (About) topics or provider Help topics.

trans-unit.source: Also, because this feature is optional, it does not work for every cmdlet, function, or script Help topic.
trans-unit.target: Also, because this feature is optional, it does not work for every cmdlet, function, or script Help topic.

trans-unit.source: However, all the Help topics that come with Windows PowerShell, including provider Help and conceptual (About) Help topics, are available online in the [Windows PowerShell](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=107116) section of the Microsoft TechNet Library.
trans-unit.target: However, all the Help topics that come with Windows PowerShell, including provider Help and conceptual (About) Help topics, are available online in the [Windows PowerShell](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=107116) section of the Microsoft TechNet Library.

trans-unit.source: To use the *Online* parameter of the Get-Help cmdlet, use the following command format.
trans-unit.target: To use the *Online* parameter of the Get-Help cmdlet, use the following command format.

trans-unit.source: For example, to get the online version of the Help topic about the Get-ChildItem cmdlet, type:
trans-unit.target: For example, to get the online version of the Help topic about the Get-ChildItem cmdlet, type:

trans-unit.source: If an online version of the Help topic is available, it will open in your default browser.
trans-unit.target: If an online version of the Help topic is available, it will open in your default browser.

trans-unit.source: If online Help is supported for a Help topic, you can also view the Internet address (URL) of the Help topic.
trans-unit.target: If online Help is supported for a Help topic, you can also view the Internet address (URL) of the Help topic.

trans-unit.source: The Internet address appears in the Related Links section of a Help topic.
trans-unit.target: The Internet address appears in the Related Links section of a Help topic.

trans-unit.source: For example, to see the URL for the online version of the Add-Computer cmdlet, type:
trans-unit.target: For example, to see the URL for the online version of the Add-Computer cmdlet, type:

trans-unit.source: The first line in the Related Links section of the topic is shown below.
trans-unit.target: The first line in the Related Links section of the topic is shown below.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to provide online support for your Help topics, see [about_Comment_Based_Help](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/99a81ccc-21a0-49ec-a1b3-9efe2b4c0bbf), and see "How to Write Cmdlet Help" ([http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=123415](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=123415)) in the MSDN (Microsoft Developer Network) library.
trans-unit.target: For information about how to provide online support for your Help topics, see [about_Comment_Based_Help](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/99a81ccc-21a0-49ec-a1b3-9efe2b4c0bbf), and see "How to Write Cmdlet Help" ([http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=123415](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=123415)) in the MSDN (Microsoft Developer Network) library.
